channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Large pothole in previous repair and getting larger and deeper as vehicles are largely forced to drive through it. Will damage vehicles and is causing increased noise for the adjacent properties, often very loud when HGVs and buses hit it., 3rd December
item.description:
Outside 4 Kayte Cottage, Kayte Lane. More or less in line with the front door of that property.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Kayte Lane, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: New pothole in the middle of the Hare & Hounds junction Churchdown, 3rd December
item.description:
Hi, there is a new pothole in the middle of the Hare & Hounds junction Churchdown, pretty deep and widening. Could it be repaired ASAP ? Perhaps an overnight repair to minimise traffic disruption ?? It's on the church side as you drive south towards Tesco. Thankyou !
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cheltenham Road East, Churchdown, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
